name: bristol

a city in southwestern England: The singer was born and raised in Bristol. Dr Seles is an expert from the University of Bristol.
More examplesFewer examplesI have to travel to Bristol for a meeting on Friday.The city of Bristol has championed green housing and technology.She grows hundreds of varieties of herbs on her organic farm near Bristol.They will fly from Bristol airport.Gloucester Road is just half a mile from Bristol city centre.
